item.description:
Join me for a scenic fall bike ride through Weston, Wayland, Sudbury and Lincoln.

The bike route is maped out and is 16.6 miles long.
http://www.bikely.com...

We'll bike at a leisurely pace, so everyone can keep up with, and look out for, each other.

We'll start & end at Weston Town Common on Boston Post Rd.
There is public parking along the Common

What to bring:
Windbreaker (dress warm)
Helmet (a must!!!)
Water and a snack
Tire repair kit (if you have one)
Tire pump (if you have one)
First Aid Kit (if you have one)
And, anything else you can think of

We can get some lunch afterwards at Brueggers Bagels and picnic on the Common.

* Weather Permitting *
Hopefully, we'll luck out and have a beautiful fall day
If it's a rainy day, the event will be cancelled. Too risky on the wet roads.
I want everyone to have a safe and fun ride.
item.name: Scenic Fall Bike Ride through Weston - Sudbury, 16.6 mi
